pull.title: Reject 199 (expired)
pull.body:
This BIP is expired according to BIP-0002 expiration rules.

It is linking an ZKCP implementation (pay-to-sudoku). But ZKCP is [broken](http://stevengoldfeder.com/papers/ZKCSP.pdf).

It is not mentioned that PTLC's are superior for many applications.

The HTLC's are discussed and explained in the lightning-rfc documents, and they are subtly different.

It is not explained how an optimal construction can be achieved using miniscript.

Tagging @ebfull

labels.name: Process
labels.description: Trying to update process or stuck due to disagreement about Process

events.body:
The claim the ZKCP is broken is outright false. That paper is about issues with particular implementation using snarks.

I don't see any issue moving this proposal to rejected, as you note there are other more efficient constructions and AFAIK this particular one isn't used as a freestanding thing. ACK.

ACK

(Waiting on https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1016 to clarify the rejection criteria but I'm happy with @gmaxwell rationale here. Plus author has been cc'd and has not opposed)
@kallewoof What is needed for this to move forward?

@ysangkok: I'm working on a revised BIP process (BIP 3) that will propose an update to the 3 year rejection rule. But it isn't completed, will need review and will take time to become active if it is accepted. In the meantime BIP 2 is clearly active so in this particular case with the BIP author not opposing this change I have ACKed. It is obviously up to the BIP editors whether they merge this or not though.

>The HTLC's are discussed and explained in the lightning-rfc documents, and they are subtly different.

Would it then be more correct to update this BIP with the subtle differences (and then change it to Final)?

After reading the discussion on https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1012, it may be better to hold off on merging this PR, as there is currently an on-going discussion about revising the BIP process per a successor to BIP2.

I would be fine with BIP-199 being updated to match the HTLCs deployed in Lightning, or it just being closed as expired. Since I don’t see evidence of the former happening, it seems to me that the proposed action in this PR is correct either per BIP2 or BIP3.

ACK e5b32a178a758e17213cf763370f8ff861448a86
I will merge this PR on or after 2025-04-04, if there is no further activity by then.
@murchandamus I wanted to remind you of this since you mentioned the date April 4th, which now lies in the past.
I’m not sure why GitHub didn’t detect that, but I merged this PR to the `master` branch per https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/commit/757e15e56883b754963dff732dde01a425f9cec6
